text: Diplomatic missions in Montenegro This page lists diplomatic missions resident in Montenegro and other cities in Montenegro. At present, the capital city of Podgorica hosts 28 embassies. Several other countries have ambassadors accredited to Montenegro, with most being resident in Belgrade. == Embassies == Podgorica {| | * * * * * * * * * * * * * * |valign=top| * * * * * * * * * * * * * * |} === Other missions === * (Delegation) === Consulates === * - Consulate-General in Kotor * - Consulate-General in Herceg Novi === Non- resident embassies === All are located in Belgrade unless otherwise noted: {| | * * * * (Bucharest) * * * (Madrid) *http://serbia.mfa.gov.by/sr/embassy/ambassador/ * * * (Bucharest) * (Zagreb) * (Vienna) * (Budapest) * (Moscow) * (Vienna) * * |valign=top| * * (Prague) * (Budapest) * * (Budapest) * (Rome) * * (Rome) * (Rome) * (Berlin) * (Vienna) * * * * (Budapest) * * * (Athens) |valign=top| * (Zagreb) * * (Budapest)http://www.mfa.gov.lv/en/#ME * (Zagreb) * (Luxembourg) * (Valletta) * * (Bucharest) * * (Berlin) * (Geneva) * (Sarajevo) * * (Sofia) * * (Rome) * (Budapest) * (Bucharest) |valign=top| * (Budapest) * * * (Tirana) * * (Moscow) * (Athens) * * * (Bucharest) * * * (Budapest) * * (Athens)http://www.mrree.gub.uy/frontend/page?1,inicio,embajadas,O,es,0, * (Sofia) * (Bucharest) * (Rome) |} == See also == * List of Ambassadors to Montenegro == References == == External links == * Podgorica Diplomatic List (In Montenegrin) * The Njegoskij Fund Network: Foreign Representations in Montenegro * Diplomatic List Category:Foreign relations of Montenegro Montenegro Diplomatic missions
